# Browarek

Browarek (; translation: Beer) is a village in the administrative district of Gmina Kroczyce, within Zawiercie County, Silesian Voivodeship, in southern Poland. It lies approximately  north-east of Kroczyce,  north-east of Zawiercie, and  north-east of the regional capital Katowice.
